reference.title: List Of files to Add To Your Repository

strow.stentry: All but the ones found under target folder. This project contains the data records (.d files) and basic source code (.b files). Please note that (.d) files are binary files that cannot be compared or merged.
All but the ones found under target folder. This project contains all Design Studio models.

All but the ones found under target and src folders . You still need to keep empty src/sub-folders like src/xml-t24i . If your version control system is based on files only (i.e. Git), create an empty (.resource) file in the folder (i.e.: .gitempty). These files are not displayed in the Project Explorer view as Eclipse filters them by default.
All but the ones found under target folder.
